metadata.title: CVE-2017-17917 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** SQL injection vulnerability in the 'where' method in Ruby on Rails 5.1.4 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the 'id' parameter. NOTE: The vendor disputes this issue because the documentation states that this method is not intended for use with untrusted input.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
